commands.title: pyramid
commands.description: make a pyramid. Take two arguments - emote name and pyramid size. If not specified, the default size would be 3. Max pyramid limit is 10. Ex. ! pyramid TenshiRocking 10. 30 seconds cd for each channel , chatting.

commands.title: hmm
commands.description: Search the definition of a words from urban dictionary

commands.title: time
commands.description: get current time based on the argument

commands.title: chatting
commands.description: ask your question to chatgpt. 1 minute cd for each chatter.

commands.title: higherorlower
commands.description: play higher or lower game. Inspired by http://www.higherlowergame.com
